attributes.name: Corrupted Seeds
attributes.description: A collection of pulsing red seeds that have been tainted by Corruption.
attributes.parsed_description: A collection of pulsing red seeds that have been tainted by Corruption.

attributes.name: Corrupted Shard
attributes.description: A shard of corrupt energy that can be found at a corruption event. Use Stonemasonry to combine corrupted shards to make a corrupted crystal.
attributes.parsed_description: A shard of corrupt energy that can be found at a corruption event. Use Stonemasonry to combine corrupted shards to make a corrupted crystal.

attributes.name: Corrupted Shield Lining
attributes.description: Soft leather lining that wraps around the inside of a shield.
attributes.parsed_description: Soft leather lining that wraps around the inside of a shield.

attributes.name: Corrupted Sigil
attributes.description: Crafting item with an attunement to the Slash Protection perk.
attributes.parsed_description: Crafting item with an attunement to the Slash Protection perk.

attributes.name: Corrupted Sliver
attributes.description: A sliver of corrupt energy that can be found at a corruption event. Use Stonemasonry to combine corrupted slivers to make a corrupted fragement.
attributes.parsed_description: A sliver of corrupt energy that can be found at a corruption event. Use Stonemasonry to combine corrupted slivers to make a corrupted fragement.

attributes.name: Corruption Catalyst
attributes.description: A vial containing a thick black fluid. Smells awful, and no one should taste it.

attributes.name: Corruption Residue

attributes.description: Someone in New Corsica will be glad to have this back.

attributes.name: Covenant Barbarian Seal
attributes.description: Use at the blacksmith and outfitting stations to change the attributes of Covenant Faction armor to strength and constitution. This process is permanent and will destroy any socketed gems.
attributes.parsed_description: Use at the blacksmith and outfitting stations to change the attributes of Covenant Faction armor to strength and constitution. This process is permanent and will destroy any socketed gems.

attributes.name: Covenant Brigand Seal
attributes.description: Use at the blacksmith and outfitting stations to change the attributes of Covenant Faction armor to dexterity and constitution. This process is permanent and will destroy any socketed gems.
attributes.parsed_description: Use at the blacksmith and outfitting stations to change the attributes of Covenant Faction armor to dexterity and constitution. This process is permanent and will destroy any socketed gems.

attributes.name: Covenant Cleric Seal
attributes.description: Use at the blacksmith and outfitting stations to change the attributes of Covenant Faction armor to focus and constitution. This process is permanent and will destroy any socketed gems.
attributes.parsed_description: Use at the blacksmith and outfitting stations to change the attributes of Covenant Faction armor to focus and constitution. This process is permanent and will destroy any socketed gems.
